name: Heikin-Ashi Daily ETF Momentum
description: Price-action strategy on daily Heikin-Ashi candles that goes long after two consecutively bullish candles without lower wicks and short after two consecutively bearish candles without upper wicks. Uses 1.5×ATR stop, 3×ATR target and exits on opposite candle or after 10 days. Risk is capped at 2 % of equity via fixed-fraction position sizing.
